atg.naming
Interface NameContextBindingListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener
All Known Subinterfaces:
NameContext, NameContextBindingEventSource, NameContextElement
All Known Implementing Classes:
GenericContext, GenericRMIService, GenericService, NameContextImpl, RelationalViewManagerImpl, SessionEventTrigger
public interface NameContextBindingListener
extends java.util.EventListener

A NameContextBindingListener is an object that can be notified of bind/unbind events from a NameContext. If an element implements this interface, it will be notified when it is bound or unbound from a NameContext. NameContextBindingListeners can also be added to a NameContext to be notified when other elements are bound or unbound from the NameContext (those listeners need not be elements of the NameContext).
